title: What is the JEFT?
abstract:
The JEFT is the acronym for the Joint-Eigenspace Fourier Transform defined on
a noncompact symmetric space. It is a consequence of a general construction of
a Fourier transform modelled on the Harish-Chandra Fourier transform (on a
semi-simple Lie group with finite centre) which (on the corresponding symmetric
space of the noncompact type) serves as the Poisson-completion of the famous
Helgason Fourier transform
